full_summary:
Environmental Remediation and Restoration Services
==============================================

### Invitation to Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a financial bid for environmental remediation and restoration services on the Settlement Lands of Wahta Mohawk Nation, Wahta Ontario.

### Project Overview

The PSPC requires a qualified contractor to perform abatement, demolition, and remediation services at the Percy and Goltz Camps. The project involves restoring the site to a safe and viable state, with completion expected within 52 weeks from notification of acceptance.

### Eligibility

This Invitation to Tender is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under EQ447-222370.

### Invited Suppliers

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Green Infrastructure Partners Inc
* QM LP Environmental
* Arcadis Canada Inc
* GFL Environmental Inc
* Milestone Environmental Contracting Inc

### Tender Requirements

* Bids must be submitted by December 13, 2023, 2:00 PM EST to be considered.
* The contractor must complete the work within 12 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.
* The contractor must complete the work within 52 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

### Contact Information

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* maim.cho@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
